scripts.build:react: chokidar "../package/react/src/**/*" "../package/react/package.json" --initial --verbose --debounce 300 -c "npm --prefix ../package/react run build && echo '✅ [package/react] build successfully'"
scripts.build:next: chokidar "../package/next/src/**/*" "../package/react/package.json" --initial --verbose --debounce 300 -c "npm --prefix ../package/next run build && echo '✅ [package/next] build successfully'"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently -n Playground,Package/React,Package/Next -c green,cyan,magenta "npm run dev" "npm run build:react" "npm run build:next"
